title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin watched the Seahawks lose to the Rams on Thursday Night Football and believes Russell Wilson is ready to move on from head coach Pete Carroll. He analyzes the Rams offense with Matthew Stafford and why Sean McVay needs to get back to his roots in order to contend for a Super Bowl. He also shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 5 of the NFL season. Former NFL running back LeSean McCoy joins the show to explain what makes Josh Allen one of the great young quarterbacks in the league right now.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
